response.overview: Kaname, a high school boy transferred to a new school, stares at Mio, the brightest student in the class. Mio is terrified by his bizarre stalker-like behavior, and asks for help from Itta, a senior student in the track team whom she has a crush on. Meanwhile, at Sawatari Apartment Complex, which has become the most popular property in the suburbs after a famous designer renovated it, mysterious falls accidents and disappearances cases happens continuously. The strange student at school, the odd wife in the apartment building, the troublesome husband at work... the "family" exists right next to you.
response.title: Yami-hara
